PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2013-00192013-01-31EC,  PCA-OLD,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada National Parks Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the National Parks of Canada Aircraft Access Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the NATIONAL PARKS AIRCRAFT ACCESS REGULATIONS to relist the Jasper Airstrip in the Schedule to the Regulations; mitigate aviation safety-related risks by providing for emergency landing in national parks; add five landing locations in the Park Reserve; and diversify recreational activities in national parks by removing paragliders and hang gliders from the scope of the Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2013-0010 Publication Date: 2013-02-13
AttachmentsAttachment
